A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It tried to do to much and ended up running too long. It also seems like there is a lack of any long-term plan for the story and tries to be unpredictable for the sake of being unpredictable. The Force Awakens might have been a copy & paste of a New Hope\, but at least it resonated emotionally and felt like Star Wars. I can't say the same about the Last Jedi.
